Vision & Mission

GAD-IT Goals
üéØ

Our Vision

To transform Maharashtra into a digitally empowered state by leveraging cutting-edge information technology solutions, fostering innovation, and ensuring seamless delivery of citizen-centric e-Governance services that enhance the quality of life for all residents.

üí° Digital Innovation
üåê Connected Governance
üë• Citizen-Centric Services
üöÄ

Our Mission

To establish Maharashtra as a leader in digital governance by implementing robust IT infrastructure, promoting digital literacy, and delivering transparent, efficient, and accessible government services through innovative technology solutions.

Key Objectives

üèóÔ∏è

Infrastructure Development

Build and maintain state-of-the-art IT infrastructure to support digital governance initiatives across all government departments.

üì±

Digital Services

Develop and deploy user-friendly digital platforms that provide seamless access to government services for citizens and businesses.

üéì

Capacity Building

Enhance digital literacy and technical capabilities of government officials and citizens through comprehensive training programs.

üîí

Data Security

Ensure robust cybersecurity measures and data protection protocols to maintain citizen trust and government integrity.

ü§ù

Stakeholder Collaboration

Foster partnerships with industry, academia, and civil society to drive innovation and technology adoption.

üìä

Performance Monitoring

Implement data-driven governance through analytics and performance monitoring systems for continuous improvement.

Strategic Goals for Digital Maharashtra

2025

Digital Foundation

Complete digital infrastructure rollout and achieve 100% online service delivery for citizen services.

2027

Smart Governance

Implement AI-powered governance systems and achieve paperless administration across all departments.

2030

Digital Excellence

Establish Maharashtra as India's leading digital state with world-class e-Governance standards.
